feed.title: The Anfield Wrap
feed.author: The Anfield Wrap
feed.description:
Liverpool FC through the eyes of match-going supporters, the award-winning Anfield Wrap podcast talks honestly and passionately about every game The Reds play home and away in the Premier League, the cups and European competition. Also covering LFC news, gossip and analysis, TAW has grown from two free shows a week in 2011 to a subscription package of circa 30 shows a month in 2016. More information at http://www.theanfieldwrap.com

To grab our huge discount off your NordVPN plan - go to https://nordvpn.com/taw will also give you 4 additional months for free on the 2-year plan. There's no risk with Nord’s 30 day money-back guarantee!

items.title: West Ham 0-2 Liverpool: Post Match Show
items.author: The Anfield Wrap
items.description:
The Anfield Wrap’s post-match reaction podcast after Liverpool gained 3 points and a clean sheet at The London Stadium against West Ham.



Neil Atkinson is joined by Steve Graves and Rob Gutmann.



Subscribe to The Anfield Wrap for Liverpool's season so far

items.title: West Ham v Liverpool: Pre Match Warm Up
items.author: The Anfield Wrap
items.description:
The Anfield Wrap's pre match show as Liverpool go away to West Ham this Sunday.



Ian Ryan hosts Jack Hunter-Spivey, Craig Hannan and Neil Atkinson.



Also in the show, Geo Mackie from Hammers Chat.



Subscribe for more pre-match build up around West Ham v Liverpool...

items.title: A Compressed Table: The Friday Show
items.author: The Anfield Wrap
items.description:
In the week's Friday Show we look at the weekends fixtures and how compressed the league is and how results could completely change the outlook of the table.



Neil Atkinson is joined by Kieran Molyneux and Joey D'Urso in the studio and also chats to Andy Middleton, Robbie Scotcher, Jack Collins and Louis Beneventi.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

items.title: Liverpool 1 PSV Eindhoven 4: The Review
items.author: The Anfield Wrap
items.description:
The Anfield Wrap’s review podcast looking back at Liverpool's defeat to PSV Eindhoven in the Champions League at Anfield.



Dan Morgan hosts Neil Atkinson and Sean Rogers...



This week's 'Review' show is part of the 'TAW Free Content Week' - Subscribe to The Anfield Wrap for more

items.title: Pitiful Liverpool Plumb New Depths: TAW Midweek Extra
items.author: The Anfield Wrap
items.description:
Liverpool's pathetic form continued with a listless, limp display in the Champions League against PSV Eindhoven.To comb the wreckage of what is becoming of Liverpool's season are Josh Sexton, Rob Gutmann, Adam Melia and Ian Salmon.



Subscribe to The Anfield Wrap for more on Liverpool's 25/26 season…
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

items.title: Forest, First Half Shots & Pressures: The Trends
items.author: The Anfield Wrap
items.description:
In this quick-hit edition of The Trends, we break down Liverpool’s performance against Forest: the first-half shooting woes, the absence of Luis Díaz, and what the numbers tell us about pressures and pressure regains...



Neil Atkinson is joined by Josh Williams.



⁠Subscribe for more on Liverpool's season..
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
